```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(moonBook2)
library(kormaps2014)
library(maps)
library(mapproj)

data = read.csv('total_data.csv')
k_pop = korpop2[1:25,]
k_pop[,26:40] = data[,2:16]

ggChoropleth(k_pop, kormap2, fillvar='공시지가', subarea=c('서울'),
             tooltip='행정구역별_읍면동', title = '공시지가', interactive=T)
```
